title: Packet Loss
body: **Does anyone know how can i fix packet loss issues.**I never had this problem before and suddenly two days before I get this issue, and i wanna play LoL badly****

replies.body: ikr, all of a sudden, it went from being fine on wifi to just massive packet loss for no reason. Used to be able to play easy with wifi, 20 ping, 120 fps, now I have to use wired connection because the packetloss between the servers and my internet just went splat. Stupid Netflix is whats affecting it Im told. I don't even get why I get 35 ping on wired, but at least it doesn't spike.
